mapper.select: SELECT m.MSG_ID, m.ROOM_ID, m.SENDER_ID, m.CONTENT, m.SENT_AT, vn.VIRTUAL_NICKNAME AS senderNickname FROM CHAT_MESSAGES m LEFT JOIN VIRTUAL_NICKNAMES vn ON (m.SENDER_ID = vn.USER_ID AND m.ROOM_ID = vn.ROOM_ID) WHERE m.ROOM_ID = #{roomId} ORDER BY m.SENT_AT ASC
